    • loadSceneFromFile

      public Scene.SceneBuilder loadSceneFromFile(String myFile)
      open xml file send the file to func InitializeFromXMLstring (in packet parser , in class SenceDescriptor) that return Object (SenceDescriptor). use parameter in _senceDesc to put in SceneBuilder fields
      Parameters:
      myFile - - string
      Returns:
      SceneBuilder
